actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill making an appropriation for the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1980, for a grant to the Eastern Carolina Vocational Center.
subjects: Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: Appropriates the sum of $1,500,855 for fiscal year 1980 for the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare, for the purpose of providing a grant pursuant to the special demonstration program for improving rehabilitation services for handicapped individuals under the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, to the Eastern Carolina Vocational Center, Greenville, North Carolina, to construct a recreational-residential facility.

titles.title: A bill making an appropriation for the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1980, for a grant to the Eastern Carolina Vocational Center.
